long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Advanced tool for downloading streams. Video Downloader Global records and later download any streaming video you want from most popular websites and streaming platforms Twitch.

Aside from recording streaming videos, the Downloader also saves any video in mp4/webm format from any website. Just click the button and Video Downloader Global will do the rest.

Main features of the extension:
1) Download any mp4/webm video from any website
2) Record and download streaming videos from multiple streaming platforms

This is Downloader has a powerful feature which could be useful to gamers, streamers and their fans. Save video or stream in one click and keep it for future use.

How to:
- Add the extension to your Chrome browser
- Go to your favourite streaming platform or any website with video or live
- Check if the Video Downloader Global icon turns red it means there is a video or live which could be downloaded if you want to.
- Go to pop-up and start downloading video or recording a stream. Done.

All downloaded video files or recorded and downloaded streaming videos will be saved to your browser default folder.
